name: Cheese & Bones
description:
Cheese & Bones is a game i made for my uni course.

genre  - Topdown, hackNslash, WaveSurvival

Plot

Someone has stolen all your cheese!

Tracking the scent of cheese through the sewers

You exit a large pipe into what seems to be a large stone structure.

The scent of cheese is everywhere

The Thief must be around here somewhere.

Contains Basic level to learn mechanics then a wave survival and boss fight to end the game.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

Mouse/fire 1  -   can be used for everything. (except pause)

Keyboard - Escape key will pause the game/resume the game.

Optional

Keyboard - Spacebar can be used to attack

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 Built with free assets. - Unity Assets Store

Sound Effects - Royalty free

Music by Adrian von Ziegler.
